org.seedstack.business.api.interfaces.assembler

Interface Assembler<A,D>

  • Type Parameters:
    A - the aggregate root
    D - the dto type
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractBaseAssembler, BaseAssembler, BaseTupleAssembler, ModelMapperAssembler, ModelMapperTupleAssembler

    public interface Assembler<A,D>
    This interface represents the Assembler pattern.

    It provides two types of transformations:

    • assembling data from one or multiple aggregates into a representation of the model or a part of the model.
    • merging data from a DTO into one or multiple aggregates
    See Also:
    FluentAssembler

      Returns the DTO type handled by the assembler.
      void mergeAggregateWithDto(A targetAggregate, D sourceDto)

    • Method Detail

      • assembleDtoFromAggregate

        D assembleDtoFromAggregate(A sourceAggregate)
        Creates a new DTO and assemble it from the aggregate.

        Equivalent of assembleDtoFromAggregate(new D(), sourceAggregate)

        Parameters:
        sourceAggregate - The source aggregate
        Returns:
        the resulting dto

      • assembleDtoFromAggregate

        void assembleDtoFromAggregate(D targetDto,

        Updates an existing DTO with a source aggregate root.
        Parameters:

        sourceAggregate - The source aggregate

      • mergeAggregateWithDto

        void mergeAggregateWithDto(A targetAggregate,
                           D sourceDto)
        Merges a source DTO into an existing aggregate root.
        Parameters:
        targetAggregate - The target aggregate
        sourceDto - The source dto

      • getDtoClass

        Class<D> getDtoClass()
        Returns the DTO type handled by the assembler.

        This method is used by assembleDtoFromAggregate(Object) to determine the DTO type to instantiate.

        Returns:
        the dto class
